Title: Requires written request and review of proposed reductions in the level of fire services
Summary: Requires written request, including environmental impact statement, and review by community boards, borough presidents and the council of proposed reductions in the level of fire services, including closure of firehouses or removal or relocation of fire fighting units.
LawCode: Amd ยง487, NYC Chart; add ยง15-131-a, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring written request and review of proposed reductions in the level of fire services
